glsa.title: PPP: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: An integer overflow in PPP might allow local attackers to obtain sensitive information.

background.p: PPP is a Unix implementation of the Point-to-Point Protocol

description.p: Integer overflow is discovered in the getword function in options.c in PPP

impact.p: A local attacker could execute process with extremely long options list, possibly obtaining sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All PPP users should upgrade to the latest version:
